questions.question_text: _____ param hitkārī, jagat māhī… ṭek. Prabhupadu pragaṭ karāvat _____ , bhāram miṭāvat bhārī… 1
questions.explanation: This is a fill in the blank question from the kirtan by Brahmanand Swami.

questions.question_text: “Satpuruṣhne viṣhe draḍh prīti e ja ātmadarshannu sāadhan chhe ane satpuruṣhno mahimā jāṇyānu paṇ e ja sāadhan chhe ane Parameshvarnu sākṣhāt darshan thāvānu paṇ e ja sāadhan chhe.”
questions.explanation: This quote describes the importance of firm love for the Satpurush.

questions.question_text: jene ekāntiknā _____ sthiti thaī hoy te thakī ja _____ dharma pamāy chhe.
questions.explanation: This quote explains how one can attain the dharma of the Ekantik.

questions.question_text: “Swadharma, gnān, vairāgya ane māhātmyagnān teṇe sahit je Bhagwānnī bhakti teṇe yukta evā je Bhagwānnā Ekāntik Sādhu tenā prasang thakī Bhāgwat Dharmanu poṣhaṇ thāy chhe ane vaḷī jīvne mokṣhanu je dvār te paṇ evā Sādhunā prasang thakī ughāḍu thāy chhe.”
questions.explanation: This quote discusses the benefits of associating with an Ekantik Sadhu.

questions.question_text: “shāstre kahyā je niṣhkām, nirlobh, nirmān, nihsvād, nihsneh ityādik santnā lakṣhaṇ tene sāmbhaḷīne evā lakṣhaṇ jyā dekhāy evā je sant tene ne Bhagwānne sākṣhāt sambandh hoy; māṭe evā santnā vachane karīne Bhagwānno nishchay karavo ne tenā vachanmā draḍh vishvās karavo tene nishchay kahīe.”
questions.explanation: This quote describes the characteristics of a Sant and the importance of believing in their words.

questions.question_text: aṣhṭāvarṇe yukta evā je koṭi koṭi brahmānḍ te je Akṣharne viṣhe aṇunī peṭhe jaṇāy chhe, evu je Puruṣhottam Nārāyaṇnu ____ rūp Akṣhar te rūpe pote rahyo thako Puruṣhottamnī upāsanā kare, tene uttam nirvikalp nishchayvāḷo kahīe.
questions.explanation: This quote describes the person with ultimate faith.

questions.question_text: “je brahmarūp thayo tene ja Puruṣhottamnī bhaktino adhikār chhe.”
questions.explanation: This is a straightforward quote about who is capable of bhakti.
This quote is from a kirtan by Premanand Swami.

questions.question_text: “Koṭi janme kasar ṭaḷavānī hoy te āj ṭaḷī jāy ne brahmarūp karī mūke, jo kharekharā sādhu maḷe ne te kahe tem kare to.”
questions.explanation: This quote from Swamini Vato highlights the power of a true Sadhu.

questions.question_text: Sant kṛupāe _____ ūpaje, sant kṛupāthī sare kām; Sant kṛupāthī pāmīe, Pūraṇ Puruṣhottam Dhām.
questions.explanation: This bhaktachintamani quote talks about the grace of a sant.
